price: 86. Ceux qui sont invoqués en dehors de Lui ne disposent d’aucun pouvoir d’intercession. Seuls (pourront intercéder) ceux qui auront témoigné de la vérité en toute connaissance.
arabic: وَلَا يَمۡلِكُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَن شَهِدَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَهُمۡ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walā yamliku alladhīna yadʿūna min dūnihi al-shafāʿata illā man shahida bil-ḥaqi wahum yaʿlamūna
